sentences.sContent: Revolutionary ideas are in the air, and at least one monarch meets a bloody end!
sentences.sContent_eng: Revolutionary ideas are in the air, and at least one monarch meets a bloody end!
sentences.sCn: 革命的思想到处散播，和至少一个君主会遇到一个血腥的结局！

sentences.sContent: Those right-wing people who most honour their monarch see no reason for any apology.
sentences.sContent_eng: Those right-wing people who most honour their monarch see no reason for any apology.
sentences.sCn: 那些对君主最为尊崇的右翼人士认为没有理由作出道歉。

sentences.sContent: The chaos XiChuan mainland have no common monarch, challenge and up and scuffle, force is the only capital survive, the world is made of the strong, generation dream.
sentences.sContent_eng: The chaos XiChuan mainland have no common monarch, challenge and up and scuffle, force is the only capital survive, the world is made of the strong, generation dream.
sentences.sCn: 混乱的西川大陆上没有了共同的君主，群雄并起而混战，武力是生存下去的唯一本钱，制霸天下，是一代代强者的梦想。

remMethod.val: mon(o)(单个)+arch(统治)→个人统治→君主

words.tran: 君主的，国王的；君主政治的
君主的，君主政治的；国王的
君主政体的；君主的；赞成君主政体的
君主政体；君主国；君主政治
